name: Song of Asirra
summary: Song of Asirra started development in 2016, and has been been a solo-act labor of love ever since. It's an adventure-platformer game starring Elia, a young Healer who is thrust into action when her brother falls ill. Play as Elia and travel the vast interconnected world of Asirra, meeting a large cast of interesting characters, battling and puzzling your way through ancient temples, learning powerful magic spells, and uncovering secrets lost to time!
